title: News digest [No. 6]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Champion wood chopper Jack O’Toole in action; attraction of Lake Eppalock for picnics, boating, water sports and trout fishing for all water sport enthusiasts; exhibition of historic locomotives; bumper wheat crop at Werrimul; newly discovered scallop beds in Port Phillip Bay.
